channel.title: AWS Hosted Event Setup on AWS Immersion Day with Lacework
channel.description: Recent content in AWS Hosted Event Setup on AWS Immersion Day with Lacework

item.title: Access Your Temporary AWS Account
item.description: Only complete this section if you are running the workshop through an AWS hosted event. For an AWS hosted event, you are provided with a temporary AWS account through the AWS Workshop Studio Service. Event staff will provide you a link to your temporary AWS account and workshop content. Accept the terms and conditions and click on the Join event button. Access the workshop content on the left pane. Click on the Open AWS Console button to access the AWS console.

item.title: Access Lacework
item.description: Use the following instructions to access your Lacework account for this event Click on the Lacework Event Engine link that is provided for this event. Enter your email address, name and company. Then click Submit. Look for an invitation email in your inbox. Click on the Join Now link in the email. Next, enter your email address and click Get sign in link. Look for a Lacework - login information email in your inbox.
